#summary Basic installation instructions.

= Introduction =

Simple:
  * Install the .pl files in /var/lib/asterisk/agi-bin/
  * Install the .sh file in /var/lib/asterisk/sounds/calldb/
  * Add the extensions.conf context to your dialplan
  * Redirect an incoming DID to that context.

== Prerequisites ==

  * Asterisk (1.8+ recommended)
  * Perl
  * Asterisk::AGI for Perl
  * [http://cepstral.com Cepstral] text-to-speech (or modify genwavs.sh accordingly)

= Details =

See [http://blog.rosenberg-watt.com/2011/04/12/phoneblast-for-asterisk-because-sharing-is-caring/ my blog] for more information.
